Verses: 1 en Irudhayam Nalla Viseshaththinaal Pongugiradhu; Naan Raajaavaik Kuriththup Paadina Kaviyaich Sollugiren; En Naavu Viraivaai Ezhudhugiravanudaiya Ezhuththaani.
2 ellaa Manupuththirarilum Neer Magaa Savundhariyamullavar; Ummudaiya Udhadugalil Arul Pozhigiradhu; Aagaiyaal Dhevan Ummai Endrendraikkum Aaseervadhikkiraar.
3 savuriyavaane, Umadhu Magimaiyum Umadhu Magaththuvamumaagiya Ummudaiya Pattayaththai Neer Ummudaiya Araiyile Kattikkondu,
4 saththiyaththinimiththamum, Needhiyudan Koodiya Saandhaththinimiththamum, Umadhu Magaththuvaththile Jeyamaaga Erivaarum; Umadhu Valadhukaram Bayangaramaanavaigalai Umakku Vilangappannum.
5 ummudaiya Ambugal Koormaiyaanavaigal, Avaigal Raajaavudaiya Saththurukkalin Irudhayaththirkul Paayum; Janasadhalangal Umakkuk Keezhe Vizhuvaargal.
6 dhevane, Umadhu Singaasanam Endrendraikkumulladhu, Umadhu Raajyaththin Sengol Needhiyulla Sengolaayirukkiradhu.
7 neer Needhiyai Virumbi, Akkiramaththai Verukkireer; Aadhalaal Dhevane, Ummudaiya Dhevan Umadhuthozharaip Paarkkilum Ummai Aanandha Thailaththinaal Abishekampanninaar.
8 thandhaththinaal Seydha Aramanaigalilirundhu Purappadugaiyil, Neer Magizhumpadi Umadhu Vasthirangalellaam Vellaippolam Sandhanam Lavangam Ivaigalin Vaasanai Porundhiyadhaayirukkiradhu.
9 umadhu Naayagigalukkulle Arasarin Kumaaraththikalundu; Raajasdhiree Oppeerin Thangam Anindhavalaai Umadhu Valadhupaarisaththil Nirkiraal.
10 kumaaraththiye Kel, Nee Un Seviyaich Saaiththu Sindhiththukkol; Un Janaththaiyum Un Thagappan Veettaiyum Marandhuvidu.
11 appozhudhu Raajaa Un Azhagil Piriyappaduvaar; Avar Un Aandavar, Aagaiyaal Avaraip Panindhukol.
12 theeru Kumaaraththi Kaanikkai Konduvaruvaal; Janangalil Aisuvariyavaangalum Un Thayavai Naadi Vananguvaargal.
13 raajakumaaraththi Ullaagap Poorana Magimaiyullaval; Aval Udai Porsarigaiyaayirukkiradhu.
14 siththiraththaiyalaadai Thariththavalaai, Raajaavinidaththil Azhaiththukkondu Varappaduvaal; Aval Pinnaale Sellum Avaludaiya Thozhigalaagiya Kannigaigal Ummidaththil Koottikkonduvarappaduvaargal.
15 avargal Makizhchchiyodum Kalippodum Vandhu, Raaja Aramanaikkul Piravesippaargal.
16 umadhu Pidhaakkalukkup Badhilaaga Umadhu Kumaarar Iruppaargal; Avargalaip Boomiyengum Pirabukkalaaga Vaippeer.
17 umadhu Naamaththai Ellaath Thalaimuraigalilum Pirasdhaabappaduththuven, Idhinimiththam Janangal Ummai Endrendraikkumulla Sadhaakaalangalilum Thudhippaargal.
